bug.author: lcy-seso
bug.summary: 官网文档中的Latex符号没有正确渲染
bug.description:
PaddlePaddle 官网文档中存在 Latex 符号没有正确渲染的问题： <denchmark-link:http://www.paddlepaddle.org/docs/develop/models/nce_cost/README.html>http://www.paddlepaddle.org/docs/develop/models/nce_cost/README.html</denchmark-link>
上面文章中希腊字母omega没有正确渲染： <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/5842774/34137608-dc82e4a6-e4a6-11e7-9d36-8f6185c6a3fa.png></denchmark-link>
同样问题也存在于 operator 文档中： <denchmark-link:http://www.paddlepaddle.org/docs/develop/documentation/zh/operators.html#permalink-160-linear_chain_crf>http://www.paddlepaddle.org/docs/develop/documentation/zh/operators.html#permalink-160-linear_chain_crf</denchmark-link>
在上面的文档中，希腊字母 alpha 也没有被正确的渲染。 <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/5842774/34137647-11dc1956-e4a7-11e7-9f71-4446920a521f.png></denchmark-link>

comments.comment: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/lcy-seso>@lcy-seso</denchmark-link> 可以提到paddlepaddle.org repo下，很快就会回复和修复的。

<denchmark-link:https://github.com/lcy-seso>@lcy-seso</denchmark-link> When converting files to files, the files go through so every char after a gets escaped. This process, however, removes all the from latex code. For example, becomes . We will have some discussion within the team to figure out what's the best approach to resolve this issue. Thanks.

<denchmark-link:https://github.com/lcy-seso>@lcy-seso</denchmark-link> We just released a new <denchmark-link:http://www.paddlepaddle.org>www.paddlepaddle.org</denchmark-link> that will fix this issue for Models. Once Models repo updates its code, the content will get re-generated and you should see the Latex symbols in Models. Thanks
